list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who advises or shows the way to others.
a structure or marking which directs the motion or positioning of something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the guides for the bolt needed straightening
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các hướng dẫn cho bu lông cần thiết thẳng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a soldier, vehicle, or ship whose position determines the movements of others.
show or indicate the way to (someone).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he guided her to the front row and sat beside her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh hướng dẫn cô đến hàng trước và ngồi bên cạnh cô.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: direct or have an influence on the course of action of (someone or something).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he guided the team to a second successive win in the tournament
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã hướng dẫn đội ngũ giành chiến thắng liên tiếp thứ hai trong giải đấu
